me.alb_i986.selenium.tinafw.tests

Class HtmlReportBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.alb_i986.selenium.tinafw.tests.HtmlReportBuilder

  • public class HtmlReportBuilder
extends Object
    Encapsulates the logic for generating the HTML of a report. HtmlReportBuilder is designed with a fluent interface to allow clients to build a report by chaining the different parts of the report in any order (e.g.: title, info, screenshot, page source). There is one constrain, though:
    • beginReport() must be called first (and never again)
    • endReport() must be called last

    It provides syntax highlighting (e.g. for page sources) thanks to google-code-prettify.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HtmlReportBuilder beginReport()
      Begin the report by opening the tags html, head, body, table.
      void endReport()
      End the report by closing the tags table, body, html.
      HtmlReportBuilder info(String key, String value)
      Print the given <key, value> pair in its own line.
      HtmlReportBuilder pageSource(String pageSource)
      Print the given page source with pretty syntax highlighting.
      HtmlReportBuilder screenshot(String screenshotAsBase64)
      Prints a table row containing an img with the screenshot embedded in base64 format.
      HtmlReportBuilder title(String title)
      Print the title of the report.

      • screenshot

        public HtmlReportBuilder screenshot(String screenshotAsBase64)
        Prints a table row containing an img with the screenshot embedded in base64 format. If the argument is null, an error message will be printed.
        Parameters:
        screenshotAsBase64 - the screenshot as returned by TakesScreenshot.getScreenshotAs(org.openqa.selenium.OutputType)
        See Also:
        Data_URI_scheme @ Wikipedia
